Package net.chaossquad.mclib.command

package net.chaossquad.mclib.command
  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    net.chaossquad.mclib
     
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    DynamicSubcommandProvider
    The dynamic subcommand provider can be used to add/remove subcommands to SubcommandCommands right when the player is typing/executing the command.
    OptionParser
    A class that can parse options from a command.
    OptionParser.OptionCompleter
    Tab-completer for the OptionParser.complete(CommandSender, Result, OptionCompleter, Set, Map) method.
    Works as TabCompleter, but does not have the command and label arguments.
    OptionParser.Result
    Stores the result from parsing the options.
    SubcommandCommand
    A command that can has multiple commands as subcommands.
    You can add subcommands with SubcommandCommand.addSubcommand(String, SubcommandEntry).
    You can remove subcommands with SubcommandCommand.removeSubcommand(String).
    You can set a global permission for the command in the constructor
    You can set a DynamicSubcommandProvider that can provide subcommands dynamically in the constructor.
    You can override SubcommandCommand.onExecutionWithoutSubcommand(CommandSender, Command, String) to run code when the command is executed without subcommands.
    You can override SubcommandCommand.onExecutionWithoutPermission(CommandSender, Command, String, String[], String) to run code when the sender does not have the permission for the command.
    You can override SubcommandCommand.onExecutionWithUnknownSubcommand(CommandSender, Command, String, String[]) to run code when the given subcommand does not exist.
    SubcommandCommand.PermissionProvider
    Provides the permission for the command.
    This allows for dynamically providing a permission instead of the permission string.
    SubcommandEntry
    A subcommand entry represents one command that was added to SubcommandCommand.
    TabCompletingCommandExecutor
    This class is a combined CommandExecutor and TabCompleter.
